languages.text: {n}Взгляд девушки, нежный и полный печали, обращается к вам.{/n} "Давайте обсудим наши отношения в ином месте. Если переживем этот день, конечно".

traits.locale_text: {n}Взгляд девушки, нежный и полный печали, обращается к вам.{/n} "Давайте обсудим наши отношения в ином месте. Если переживем этот день, конечно".

languages.text: {n}Her gaze, tender and full of sorrow, comes to rest on you.{/n} "Let us discuss our relationship away from this place. Assuming, of course, that we survive the day."
languages.original_text: {n}Взгляд девушки, нежный и полный печали, обращается к вам.{/n} "Давайте обсудим наши отношения в ином месте. Если переживем этот день, конечно".

traits.locale_text: {n}Her gaze, tender and full of sorrow, comes to rest on you.{/n} "Let us discuss our relationship away from this place. Assuming, of course, that we survive the day."

{n}Her gaze, tender and full of sorrow, comes to rest on you.{/n} "Let us discuss our relationship away from this place. Assuming, of course, that we survive the day."
{n}Her gaze, tender and full of sorrow, comes to rest on you.{/n} "Let us discuss our relationship away from this place. Assuming, of course, that we survive the day."

languages.text: {n}Elle pose sur vous un regard tout à la fois tendre et empreint de chagrin.{/n} « Nous discuterons de notre relation quand nous serons loin d'ici. Si tant est que nous survivions à cette funeste journée, bien sûr. »
languages.original_text: {n}Her gaze, tender and full of sorrow, comes to rest on you.{/n} "Let us discuss our relationship away from this place. Assuming, of course, that we survive the day."

languages.text: {n}Su mirada, tierna y apesadumbrada, se para sobre ti.{/n} «Hablemos de nuestra relación lejos de aquí. Suponiendo que sobrevivamos para hacerlo, claro».
languages.original_text: {n}Her gaze, tender and full of sorrow, comes to rest on you.{/n} "Let us discuss our relationship away from this place. Assuming, of course, that we survive the day."

languages.text: {n}優しさと後悔に満ちた彼女のまなざしはあなたに注がれる。{/n}「この場所ではないどこかで、あたくしたちの関係について話し合いましょう。もちろん、今日を生き延びることができればのことですが」
languages.original_text: {n}Her gaze, tender and full of sorrow, comes to rest on you.{/n} "Let us discuss our relationship away from this place. Assuming, of course, that we survive the day."

traits.locale_text: {n}優しさと後悔に満ちた彼女のまなざしはあなたに注がれる。{/n}「この場所ではないどこかで、あたくしたちの関係について話し合いましょう。もちろん、今日を生き延びることができればのことですが」

languages.text: {n}她温柔而哀伤的目光落在你身上。{/n}“等我们离开这里之后，再讨论我们之间的关系吧。当然，前提是我们都能活下来。”
languages.original_text: {n}Her gaze, tender and full of sorrow, comes to rest on you.{/n} "Let us discuss our relationship away from this place. Assuming, of course, that we survive the day."

languages.text: {n}Ihr zärtlicher und sorgenvoller Blick ruht auf dir.{/n} "Wir sollten an einem anderen Ort über unsere Beziehung sprechen. Vorausgesetzt, wir überleben den heutigen Tag."
languages.original_text: {n}Her gaze, tender and full of sorrow, comes to rest on you.{/n} "Let us discuss our relationship away from this place. Assuming, of course, that we survive the day."

languages.text: {n}Şefkatli ve keder dolu bakışları sana odaklanıyor.{/n} "İlişkimizi buradan uzak bir yerde konuşalım. Bugünü sağ çıkaracağımızı varsayarak konuşuyorum elbette."
languages.original_text: {n}Her gaze, tender and full of sorrow, comes to rest on you.{/n} "Let us discuss our relationship away from this place. Assuming, of course, that we survive the day."
